caption:
This photograph captures a dramatic seascape under a tumultuous sky, characterized by an interplay of light and darkness. The image is dominated by an expansive sky filled with dark, heavy clouds, with some areas of lighter clouds breaking through. Sun rays dramatically pierce the clouds, creating vivid beams of light that illuminate patches of the ocean surface.

In the lower third of the photo, a silhouette of a naval ship is visible near the horizon, sailing on what appears to be a calm sea. The ship is positioned to the left and is highlighted by the shafts of sunlight breaking through the clouds, giving the scene a dynamic and somewhat ethereal feel.

The background features a series of mountains that are also silhouetted against the sky, enhancing the depth and scale of the view. The water sparkles where the sunlight touches it, contrasting with the darker tones of the clouds and the mountainous horizon.

Overall, the composition of the photograph, with its dark tones punctuated by brilliant light, creates a mood of awe and grandeur, suggesting a moment of tranquility amid the overpowering forces of nature.
title: Richmond harbor. (From the Sites Exhibition. For other images in this assignment, see fiche numbers 18, 19, 37, 38, 58.)
